entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is the one who first says 'Riddikulus!'.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is wearing a long, lace-trimmed dress and a towering hat topped with a moth-eaten vulture, and he is swinging a huge crimson handbag.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati walks forward when Professor Lupin shouts 'Parvati! Forward!'

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is the one who shouts 'Parvati! Forward!' and also roars for Seamus.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is called by Professor Lupin to dart past Parvati.

relationships.description: The mummy's sightless face is turned to Parvati and it begins to walk toward her very slowly.
Parvati is transformed into a banshee.
